arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss reveals January rethink to 'free up budget'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admits he will have to make some ''difficult decisions' in terms of juggling Wigan Athletic's January recruitment following a Christmas crisis in midfield.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief pinpoints reason for 'gutting' Birmingham City defeat
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admitted Wigan Athletic's 3-0 home defeat against new League One leaders Birmingham City had left him feeling 'gutted'.

arts.ttl: Alfie May explains bizarre goal celebration in Birmingham City's win at Wigan
arts.sum: Alfie May celebrated his first goal at Wigan Athletic by swinging around a pole and he's swung the League One title race back in Birmingham City’s favour. The ref saw it and said about the player getting off me because he was just throwing me around, I didn’t understand it.

arts.ttl: Alfie May brace helps Birmingham go top of League One with Wigan win
arts.sum: Willum Willumsson was also on the scoresheet for the visitors.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Wigan Athletic 0 Birmingham City 3 - May-day, May-day as Alfie gives Tics the Blues
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic were given a lesson in high-quality finishing as Alfie May’s brace helped Birmingham City go top of League One after a 3-0 victory at the Brick Community Stadium.

arts.ttl: Who is Phil Neumann? The coveted Birmingham City target dreaming of England
arts.sum: In addition to Blues, a clutch of Bundesliga clubs have been linked with Neumann who is described by reputable German outlet BILD as ‘one of the best defenders in the second division’. While Neumann hasn’t made the step up to the Bundesliga, he has played 173 games in Germany’s second tier – including 16 starts for seventh-placed Hannover this season.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic forward completes exit on full-time basis
arts.sum: Josh Stones has completed his permanent move to National League leaders York City after Wigan Athletic received 'a substantial offer that matched our valuation'.

arts.ttl: Saturday's League One predictions including Wigan Athletic vs. Birmingham City
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's League One fixtures, including Wigan Athletic vs. Birmingham City.

arts.ttl: Krystian Bielik shares League One first for Birmingham City and why Chris Davies moved him
arts.sum: He didn’t relish playing as an orthodox right-back against Stockport, but Bielik isn’t opposed to the position when Blues are dominating the ball. Blues are still on track to break the League One points record of 103 set by Wolverhampton Wanderers in 2013/14 and their recent eight-game winning streak is the longest the club has managed in a league season for more than 100 years.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker gives Nathan Redmond update amid Birmingham City return rumours
arts.sum: Indeed it's likely that on the flanks is where Blues will be eager to address on the recruitment front this month, and it led to links with Redmond, who is out of contract in the summer - although Burnley, themselves eyeing an instant return to the Premier League under Scott Parker, have the option to extend the deal by a further year. Having come close to returning to action around a month ago, Redmond then suffered a frustrating injury setback and has been absent from each of the Clarets' last seven matches.
